login.form.info:
Log in to neXus PRIME by providing your user name and password.
Click on 'Log in' to proceed.
login.info:
Welcome to the User Self-Service Portal of neXus PRIME !
In this user portal, you can manage your credentials like smart cards, smart tokens and certificates.
To log in with your smart card, plug the card in the card reader and click on 'Smartcard login & other'.
You can also select an alternative login method, while some functions may not be available then.
